title: President | ETH Zurich
snippet: Professor Dr. Joël Mesot has been President of ETH Zurich since 1 January 2019.

title: Office of the President | ETH Zurich
snippet: The Office of the President provides strategic and operational services to advance ETH Zurich and the President's vision and priorities.

title: Joël Mesot appointed new ETH President | ETH Zurich
snippet: Switzerland’s Federal Council has appointed Joël Mesot, Director of the Paul Scherrer Institute (PSI), as the new President of ETH Zurich. On 1 January 2019 Joël Mesot will take over from the current President, Lino Guzzella, who has continued ...

title: Executive Board | ETH Zurich
snippet: The Executive Board is the supreme committee of ETH Zurich. It is responsible for the areas education, research, and administration.

title: President of ETH Zurich Joël Mesot to hand over the baton at the end of 2026 after two successful terms of office - ETH-Rat
snippet: Professor Joël Mesot has been President of ETH Zurich since January 2019. His second term of office lasts until the end of 2026. Joël Mesot informed the ETH Board that he would not be available for a third four-year term of office. The ETH Board greatly regrets this decision, and thanks Joël ...
